original_text: And among the cities which ye shall give unto the Levites there shall be six cities for refuge, which ye shall appoint for the manslayer, that he may flee thither: and to them ye shall add forty and two cities.
korean_text: 너희가 레위인에게 줄 성읍은 살인자들이 피하게 할 도피성으로 여섯 성읍이요 그 외에 사십이 성읍이라

sentences.original_text: And among the cities which ye shall give unto the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 레위 사람들에게 줄 도시들 중에서

sentences.original_text: there shall be six cities for refuge
which ye shall appoint for the manslayer

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그리로 도망하여 살게 하기 위함이라

sentences.original_text: and to them ye shall add forty and two cities.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 도시들에 너희는 마흔 둘 도시를 더할지니라
